020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer;
021
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
024
025import java.lang.reflect.Type;
026import java.lang.reflect.WildcardType;
027import java.util.List;
028
029import org.apiguardian.api.API;
030import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
031import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.WildcardTypeNameImpl;
032
033/**
034 *  The specialisation of
035 *  {@link TypeName}
036 *  for wildcard named types.
037 *
038 *  @author Square,Inc.
039 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
040 *  @version $Id: WildcardTypeName.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $
041 *  @since 0.0.5
042 *
043 *  @UMLGraph.link
044 */
045@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: WildcardTypeName.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $" )
046@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
047public sealed interface WildcardTypeName extends TypeName
048    permits WildcardTypeNameImpl
049{
050        /*---------*\
051    ====** Methods **==========================================================
052        \*---------*/
053    /**
054     *  {@inheritDoc}
055     */
056    @Override
057    public WildcardTypeName annotated( final List<AnnotationSpec> annotations );
058
059    /**
060     *  Returns an instance of
061     *  {@link TypeName}
062     *  for the given type mirror.
063     *
064     *  @param  mirror  The type mirror for a wildcard type.
065     *  @return The respective {@code TypeName} instance.
066     */
067    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
068    public static TypeName from( final javax.lang.model.type.WildcardType mirror )
069    {
070        final var retValue = WildcardTypeNameImpl.from( mirror );
071
072        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
073        return retValue;
074    }   //  from()
075
076    /**
077     *  Returns an instance of
078     *  {@link TypeName}
079     *  for the given wildcard type.
080     *
081     *  @param  wildcardName    The wildcard type.
082     *  @return The respective {@code TypeName} instance.
083     */
084    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
085    public static TypeName from( final WildcardType wildcardName )
086    {
087        final var retValue = WildcardTypeNameImpl.from( wildcardName );
088
089        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
090        return retValue;
091    }   //  from()
092
093    /**
094     *  Returns an instance of
095     *  {@link TypeName}
096     *  for the given type mirror.
097     *
098     *  @param  mirror  The type mirror for a wildcard type.
099     *  @return The respective {@code TypeName} instance.
100     *
101     *  @deprecated Use
102     *      {@link #from(javax.lang.model.type.WildcardType)}
103     *      instead.
104     */
105    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
106    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
107    public static TypeName get( final javax.lang.model.type.WildcardType mirror ) { return from( mirror ); }
108
109    /**
110     *  Returns an instance of
111     *  {@link TypeName}
112     *  for the given wildcard type.
113     *
114     *  @param  wildcardName    The wildcard type.
115     *  @return The respective {@code TypeName} instance.
116     *
117     *  @deprecated Use
118     *      {@link #from(WildcardType)}
119     *      instead.
120     */
121    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
122    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
123    public static TypeName get( final WildcardType wildcardName ) { return from( wildcardName ); }
124
125    /**
126     *  Returns a subtype for the given type.
127     *
128     *  @param  type    The type.
129     *  @return The subtype.
130     */
131    @SuppressWarnings( "ClassReferencesSubclass" )
132    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
133    public static WildcardTypeName subtypeOf( final Type type )
134    {
135        final var retValue = WildcardTypeNameImpl.subtypeOf( type );
136
137        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
138        return retValue;
139    }   //  subtypeOf()
140
141    /**
142     *  Returns a type that represents an unknown type that extends the given
143     *  type. For example, if {@code type} is
144     *  {@link CharSequence CharSequence.class},
145     *  this returns {@code ? extends CharSequence}. If {@code type} is
146     *  {@link Object Object.class},
147     *  this returns {@code ?}, which is shorthand for
148     *  {@code ? extends Object}.
149     *
150     *  @param  type    The type.
151     *  @return The subtype.
152     */
153    @SuppressWarnings( "ClassReferencesSubclass" )
154    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
155    public static WildcardTypeName subtypeOf( final TypeName type )
156    {
157        final var retValue = WildcardTypeNameImpl.subtypeOf( type );
158
159        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
160        return retValue;
161    }   //  subtypeOf()
162
163    /**
164     *  Returns a super type for the given type.
165     *
166     *  @param  type    The type.
167     *  @return The super type.
168     */
169    @SuppressWarnings( "ClassReferencesSubclass" )
170    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
171    public static WildcardTypeName supertypeOf( final Type type )
172    {
173        final var retValue = WildcardTypeNameImpl.supertypeOf( type );
174
175        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
176        return retValue;
177    }   //  supertypeOf()
178
179    /**
180     *  Returns a type that represents an unknown supertype of the given type.
181     *  For example, if {@code type} is
182     *  {@link String String.class},
183     *  this returns {@code ? super String}.
184     *
185     *  @param  type    The type.
186     *  @return The super type.
187     */
188    @SuppressWarnings( "ClassReferencesSubclass" )
189    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
190    public static WildcardTypeName supertypeOf( final TypeName type )
191    {
192        final var retValue = WildcardTypeNameImpl.supertypeOf( type );
193
194        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
195        return retValue;
196    }   //  supertypeOf()
197
198    /**
199     *  {@inheritDoc}
200     */
201    @Override
202    public WildcardTypeName withoutAnnotations();
203}
204//  interface WildcardTypeName
205
206/*
207 *  End of File
208 */
